AeRianna Harris looks on after receiving contact under the basket during Purdues victory over Ohio State on Dec PERIOD   PERIOD

The Womens Basketball Coaches Association formally announced the  Preseason Wade Trophy Watch List on Thursday and PurduesAeRianna Harriswas among the  players from across the country to be honored PERIOD

The Wade Trophy will be awarded for the forty-third year in  PERIOD It is one of the most respected national player of the year awards in womens college basketball PERIOD Since  it has been presented to the WBCA NCAA Division I National Player of the Year PERIOD

With this recognition Harris now has five preseason honors heading into the  season along with Preseason AllBig Ten Lisa Leslie Award Watch List No PERIOD  in ESPNWs Preseason Top25 and Citizen Naismith Trophy Watch List PERIOD

Harris will enter her senior campaign as the NCAA active blocked shots leader with  career rejections more than  ahead of the next Division I player on the list Lauren Cox from Baylor PERIOD The Indianapolis native can add to recordbreaking haul with  rebounds to break the program career mark of  held by Lindsay WisdomHylton PERIOD

The list of candidates for the Wade Trophy is composed of players selected by the WBCA NCAA Division I Coaches AllAmerica Selection Committee PERIOD The committee will review the list in January to determine if additional players will be added based on their play during the first half of the  season PERIOD

Harris and the Boilermakers will tip off the  campaign at Mackey Arena on Sunday Nov PERIOD  against Milwaukee PERIOD It will be Boilermaker Kids Club Day and Service Appreciation Day PERIOD Any current or retired military members police officers firefighters or hospital staff can purchase a  general admission ticket by calling .. or by visiting the ticket box office at Mackey Arena PERIOD
